short_summary: Implementing a standardized set of tools to monitor and manage network infrastructure from a centralized environment for the Government of Canada.
description: Shared Services Canada's Network and Security Services Branch is responsible for the planning, design, and operations of the Government of Canada (GC) Information Technology (IT) network infrastructure; and the management of cyber and IT security services that protects GC data and technology assets. Monitoring and managing Government of Canada networking infrastructure is key to anticipating network service interruptions, decreasing incident response times, and increasing network security. The objective is to implement a standardized set of tools within SSC networks to allow operations teams to monitor and manage network infrastructure from a centralized environment. The information obtained through such tools will help SSC and partner organizations make informed decisions to optimize network environments throughout the country. The solution will be used in conjunction with other components to establish a standardized monitoring toolset to be ultimately deployed across all SSC partner networks over multiple years. The required solution should have the following key capabilities: Network Visibility & Availability Monitoring, Device Configuration Management, Performance & Capacity Monitoring, Reporting and Programmability. The estimated quantity of commodity: to be determined. The duration of contract: 8 years + 2 one year option periods. The time frame of delivery: initial delivery before March 31, 2023. The solution will be provided by the vendors who will be selected through a competitive process.

# Network Monitoring, Awareness & Reporting Solution

**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00021012/T
**Solicitation Number:** BPM017562/21012

## Overview

The Networks and Security Services Branch of Shared Services Canada is seeking a highly scalable software solution to provide network visibility and availability monitoring, device configuration management, performance and capacity monitoring, and reporting and programmability. This solution will be used in conjunction with other components to establish a standardized monitoring toolset for the Government of Canada's networks.

## Key Capabilities

* Network Visibility & Availability Monitoring
* Device Configuration Management
* Performance & Capacity Monitoring
* Reporting and Programmability

## Contract Details

* **Duration:** 8 years, with two 1-year option periods
* **Time Frame of Delivery:** Initial delivery before March 31, 2023
